## Installation

### Docker

```bash
docker pull ghcr.io/djryanj/media-viewer:VERSION
```

### Binary

Download the appropriate binary for your platform from the assets below and run:

```bash
chmod +x media-viewer-VERSION-OS-ARCH
./media-viewer-VERSION-OS-ARCH
```
